mapper.select: SELECT max(orderno) KEEP(DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY orderno DESC) as orderno FROM order_sale
select orderno from order_sale where userid = #{userid} order by orderno

select distinct orderno,userid,username,addr_1,addr_2,addr_3, email,phone,orderdate,state,salestate, o.cpnum,cpname, (select sum(cost) as allCost from sale s,order_info i where s.saleno=i.saleno group by orderno having orderno = #{orderno}) as allCost, (select distinct decode(type,'0',value,'1', (select sum(cost)*value/100 from sale s,order_info o where s.saleno = o.saleno group by orderno having orderno = #{orderno})) as discost from coupon c,sale s,order_info o where o.saleno = s.saleno and cpnum= (select cpnum from order_sale where orderno = #{orderno}) and orderno = #{orderno}) as discost, (select distinct decode(type,'0', (select sum(cost)-value from sale s,order_info o where s.saleno = o.saleno group by orderno having orderno = #{orderno}) ,'1', (select sum(cost)-(sum(cost)*value/100) from sale s,order_info o where s.saleno = o.saleno group by orderno having orderno = #{orderno})) as finalcost from coupon c,sale s,order_info o where o.saleno = s.saleno and cpnum= (select cpnum from order_sale where orderno = #{orderno}) and orderno = #{orderno}) as finalcost from order_sale o,coupon c,sale s where o.cpnum = c.cpnum and orderno = #{orderno} order by orderno

select distinct orderno,userid,username,addr_1,addr_2,addr_3, email,phone,orderdate,state,salestate, (select sum(cost) as allCost from sale s,order_info i where s.saleno=i.saleno group by orderno having orderno = #{orderno}) as allCost, 0 as disCost, (select sum(cost) as allCost from sale s,order_info i where s.saleno=i.saleno group by orderno having orderno = #{orderno}) as finalCost from order_sale o,sale s where orderno = #{orderno} order by orderno

select orderno,o.saleno,salename, cost, o.amount, (cost*o.amount) as costSum, uuid,imagepath,filename from order_info o,sale s,sale_img i where o.saleno = s.saleno and s.saleno = i.saleno and orderno = #{orderno}
